game.name: HAKONIWA DEFENSE
game.shortDescription: "HAKONIWA DEFENSE" is a tower defense game in which the protagonist, who has lost his memory, cooperates with the girls to progress. Defeat enemies to regain your memory.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "HAKONIWA DEFENSE" is a tower defense game in which the protagonist, who has lost his memory, cooperates with the girls to progress. Defeat enemies to regain your memory.
